name: sitevision-version-checker
description: Check which version of SiteVision a website is using.

PORT.description: The port your server should listen to.

CACHE_TTL.description: The cache TTL in seconds for your version lookups. This is to make sure your server is not abused.

REQUEST_TIMEOUT.description: The maximum duration in milliseconds which your server will wait for the target site to answer.

REQUEST_MAX_REDIRECTS.description: The maximum number of redirects which will be followed during the request.
